FAQ.question: Why is Plot ID important in Odisha?
FAQ.answer: It helps users correctly identify land parcels and access ROR, Bhunaksha, and mutation details easily.

FAQ.question: Can I find Plot ID using hal or sabik details?
FAQ.answer: Yes. Plot ID search works with either hal or sabik plot numbers, village, and khatiyan details.

FAQ.question: Does Plot ID confirm ownership?
FAQ.answer: No. It only identifies the plot; ownership must be checked in the ROR.
